name: Serene Asylum
storyline: You wake up on the operating table in an abandoned insane asylum unaware of how you got there. Wander around the dark halls of horror as you solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the dark history of Santa Rosa Asylum. Escape with your sanity intact or suffer to repeat the endless cycle. Now if you're reading this, you need to wake up!
summary: Serene Asylum is a first-person psychological horror puzzle game. Solve puzzles as you uncover the dark history of the insane asylum and try to escape before you are stuck in game forever. But don't be scared, it's just a game after all, right? Now... if you can read this, you need to wake up!
